Package com.alvermont.terraj.fracplanet.colour

Contains classes that hold and process RGB colour information.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ByteRGBA Class to represent red-green-blue colours stored with 8-bit resolution.
FloatRGBA Class to represent rgb colours with floating point storage Note the various methods in this class of the form opXXXXX are translations of the original C++ operator overloads.
ImmutableFloatRGBA Immutable version of FloatRGBA class.
 

Package com.alvermont.terraj.fracplanet.colour Description

Contains classes that hold and process RGB colour information.
